12 def create_clear_all_marker(time):
13  """
14  Create marker for clearing all
15 
16  :param time: time ros
17  """
18  marker = Marker()
19  marker.header.frame_id = "world"
20  marker.header.stamp = time
21  marker.id = 0
22  marker.ns = "niryo_robot_vision"
23  marker.action = marker.DELETEALL
24 
25  return marker

29  """
30  Create marker for clearing
31 
32  :param id_marker: id of the marker
33  :param time: time ros
34  """
35  marker = Marker()

39  marker.ns = "niryo_robot_vision"
40  marker.action = marker.DELETE
41 
42  return marker

45 def create_workspace(id_workspace, time, position, orientation, x_size, y_size, z_size):
46  """
47  Create workspace plane
48 
49  :param id_workspace: id of the marker
50  :param time: time ros
51  :param position: position of the marker
52  :param orientation: orientation of the marker
53  :param x_size: size in x of the object
54  :param y_size: size in y of the object
55  :param z_size: size in z of the object
56  """
57  marker = Marker()
58  marker.header.frame_id = "world"
59  marker.header.stamp = time
60  marker.id = id_workspace
61  marker.ns = "niryo_robot_vision"
62 
63  marker.action = marker.ADD
64  marker.pose.position = Point(*position)
65  marker.pose.position.x -= z_size * 2
66  marker.pose.orientation = Quaternion(*orientation)
67  marker.type = marker.CUBE
68  marker.scale = Vector3(x_size, y_size, z_size)
69  # marker.color = ColorRGBA(0.99, 0.99, 0.99, 1.0)
70  marker.color = ColorRGBA(1.0, 1.0, 1.0, 1.0)
71 
72  return marker
73 
74 
75 def create_text_marker(id_text, text, time, position, orientation, size):
76  """
77  Create text marker
78 
79  :param id_text: id of the marker
80  :param text: text in the marker
81  :param time: time ros
82  :param position: position of the marker
83  :param orientation: orientation of the marker
84  :param size: size of the text
85  """
86  marker = Marker()
87  marker.header.frame_id = "world"
88  marker.header.stamp = time
89  marker.id = id_text
90  marker.ns = "niryo_robot_vision"
91 
92  marker.action = marker.ADD
93  marker.pose.position = Point(*position)
94  marker.pose.position.z += 0.01
95  marker.pose.orientation = Quaternion(*orientation)
96  marker.type = marker.TEXT_VIEW_FACING
97  marker.scale = Vector3(size, size, size)
98  marker.color = ColorRGBA(0.0, 0.725, 0.910, 1.0)
99  marker.text = text
100 
101  return marker

103 
104 def create_marker_rviz(position, orientation, id_marker, time):
105  """
106  Create marker for the workspace
107 
108  :param position: position of the marker
109  :param orientation: orientation of the marker
110  :param id_marker: id of the marker
111  :param time: time ros
112  """
113  marker = Marker()
114  marker.header.frame_id = "world"
115  marker.header.stamp = time
116  marker.id = id_marker
117  marker.ns = "niryo_robot_vision"
118  marker.type = marker.MESH_RESOURCE
119  if id_marker == 1:
120  marker.mesh_resource = "package://niryo_robot_vision/meshes/marker_1.dae"
121  else:
122  marker.mesh_resource = "package://niryo_robot_vision/meshes/marker_2.dae"
123  marker.mesh_use_embedded_materials = True
124  marker.action = marker.ADD
125  marker.pose.position = Point(*position)
126  marker.pose.position.z += 0.0005
127  marker.pose.orientation = Quaternion(*orientation)
128  marker.scale = Vector3(1, 1, 1)
129  marker.color = ColorRGBA(1, 1, 1, 1)
130 
131  return marker
132 
133 
134 def publish_object_rviz(position, orientation, size, type_marker, color, id_marker, publisher, time, duration):
135  """
136  Create and publish object and marker object
137 
138  :param position: position of the marker
139  :param orientation: orientation of the marker
140  :param size: size of the object
141  :param type_marker: type of the object(cylinder or square)
142  :param color: color of the object
143  :param id_marker: id of the marker
144  :param publisher: ros publisher
145  :param time: time ros
146  :param duration: time to live
147  """
148  marker = Marker()
149  marker.header.frame_id = "world"
150  marker.header.stamp = time
151  # marker.lifetime = duration
152  marker.id = id_marker
153  marker.ns = "niryo_robot_vision"
154 
155  marker.action = marker.ADD
156  marker.pose.position = Point(*position)
157  marker.pose.position.z += 0.005
158  marker.pose.orientation = Quaternion(*orientation)
159  if type_marker == ObjectType.SQUARE:
160  marker.type = marker.CUBE
161  marker.scale = Vector3(size[0], size[1], 0.01)
162  else:
163  marker.type = marker.CYLINDER
164  marker.scale = Vector3(size[0], size[0], 0.01)
165 
166  marker.color.a = 1
167  if color == "RED":
168  marker.color.r = 1.0
169  elif color == "BLUE":
170  marker.color.b = 1.0
171  elif color == "GREEN":
172  marker.color.g = 1.0
173 
174  publisher.publish([marker])
175 
176 
177 def get_pose(workspace, x_rel, y_rel, yaw_rel, yaw_center=None):
178  """
179  Transform the pose in the workspace to the world pose
180 
181  :param workspace: dict of the workspace which contains name, matrix, ratio
182  :param x_rel: object base x position relative to workspace
183  :param y_rel: object base y position relative to workspace
184  :param yaw_rel: object base rotation on z relative to workspace
185  :param yaw_center: Avoid over rotation
186  """
187 
188  position = np.dot(workspace["matrix_position"], np.array([x_rel, y_rel, 1]))
189  camera_rotation = transformations.euler_matrix(0, 0, yaw_rel)
190  # Here we correct the object orientation to be similar to base_link if
191  # the object in on the ground. Not neccessarily needed to be honest...
192  convention_rotation = np.array([[0, -1, 0, 0],
193  [-1, 0, 0, 0],
194  [0, 0, -1, 0],
195  [0, 0, 0, 1]])
196 
197  object_rotation = transformations.concatenate_matrices(
198  workspace["matrix_rotation"], camera_rotation, convention_rotation)
199  roll, pitch, yaw = transformations.euler_from_matrix(object_rotation)
200 
201  # Correcting yaw to avoid out of reach targets
202  if yaw_center is not None:
203  if yaw < yaw_center - np.pi / 2:
204  yaw += np.pi
205  elif yaw > yaw_center + np.pi / 2:
206  yaw -= np.pi
207 
208  q = transformations.quaternion_from_euler(roll, pitch, yaw)
209 
210  return position, q
